call_number: UA Cameron Staff Access-Maps. Western Canada C-20b
description: --Pacific railway line and profiles--;Map extent includes current provinces & territories of Manitoba, Saskatchewan, Alberta, British Columbia, Nunavut, Northwest Territories and Yukon Territories.;Map originally drawn as map No. 8 of the Appendix to Report of the Commissioner of Crown Lands, Part II.;hyetal data--;British North America Indian population statistics--;1 map on 2 sheets, each sheet 77 X 142 cm. Lith., Toronto".;Geographical authorities used in compiling the map J. Additional divisions appear to have been added at a later date (copper-bearing rocks, sandstones, Tertiary, Cretaceous etc.)--;Map includes:;Relief shown by hachures.;mean temperature isotherms--;exploratory routes and important discoveries, physical descriptions--;faunal distribution limits--;forts: French Canadian forts at time of conquest; French forts prior to the cessation of Hudson's Bay to Great Britain; Hudson's Bay forts/posts--;international boundary with USA - 1818 and 1846--;Bounday of Hudson's Bay after the Treaty of Ultrect in 1713--
